content: Fun little tile based strategy, bought the payed version in hopes of watching less ads, but there is no peceptible difference. I would appreciate a detailed explanation of what the paid version gives you vs the free one.
Took to long
Lifted from classic paper hex board games... with smooth mechanics. Not easy!

Love it

Great game

Excellent

FOKKEN KWAAI !!!  Kwaai fokken game .
This series is great, easy and fun to play.  If you like the old board wargames, you'll love this!
Although there is still the use of gold in the paid version, there are so many more units available verses the older games.
Lets roll!! Keeping bringing in the great games :)

Paid version freezes in confusion to contemplate forcing ads during game play. Ads force on some missions, but not on others- even on the paid version- This is with no previous install of the free-ad supported version. I have a game of frozen missions....reinstalled, restarting & other fire from the hip fixes result similarly; a game frozen, mid-mission, after an ad forced post-turn 10+ & the GUI becomes inoperable- The ad code is active in the paid version 30 second commercials &/or freeze out after pay
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. There shouldn't be any forced ads in the premium version. In which mission do you get them? For better communication please contact support@handy-games.com. Thank you!
